name: SECTION 3 – PRE-CONSTRUCTION - MATERIAL , PERSONNEL & THIRD PARTY APPROVALS (P&G / ESTABLISHMENT)
Detail / Activity - Provide the Engineer with a detailed work method statement (WMS) with details of how the pressure testing will be carried out at least 10 Working Days prior to the test
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - WSP sign off
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - Pre aproval
Work Shall not proceed past the Hold Point until released by the organisation imposing the Hold Point.
Detail / Activity - Pressure testing will be carried out at least 10 Working Days prior to the test
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - All Testing
Work Shall not proceed past the Hold Point until released by the organisation imposing the Hold Point.
SECTION 4 – CONSTRUCTION ACTIVITY - WASTEWATER PIPELINE TESTING
Detail / Activity - Backfill/cover with embedment before testing.
○ End caps in place, provision for filling the pipeline and bleeding air.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Wastewater Rising Main Pipelines – 800kPa
○ Ensure the STP is not more than 25% above the rated pressure of any pipeline component.
Standard / Specification - PS 22.7.12 d), PS 22.7.13 b), Appendix XXI
Verifying Document - Test Report, Pressure Log in.csv or .xlsx format
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - All Pipeline, All valves
Work Shall not proceed past the Hold Point until released by the organisation imposing the Hold Point.
